answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hello Douglas,
If you're asking about money in an account with ICMA-RC, you'll need to contact them directly. (While affiliated, ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can reach ICMA-RC at icmarc.org or by calling 1-800-669-7400.

author: DOUGLAS HENRY
text: I was wondering if in these trying times we had the opportunity to put some of our money into precious metal?
title: Precious Metal
